News.headline: Tickets: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Braintree Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to Cressing Road on Monday 26th December, 3:00pm KO.
News.description:
Please note that this game will be pay on the day only and will be a Category ‘A’ match.

The prices for the game will be:
Seat Adults - £18.00
Seat Concessions - £12.00
Ground Adults - £17.00
Ground Concessions - £11.00
Ground Under 16 - £6.00
Ground Under 11 - £4.00

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Disabled and Wheelchair fans will have to pay the age equivalent with the carer going free of charge.
